_A_FIELDSET_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The AFieldset component is used to group form elements into a logical set. It supports various features, such as error display, help text, content collapse/expand, and customization of styles for child elements.
_A_FIELDSET_PROPS_TEXTS_DESCRIPTION_: Allows you to customize the text for the collapse and expand actions of the component. By default, _A_FIELDSET_COLLAPSE_CLOSE_ is used for closing and _A_FIELDSET_COLLAPSE_OPEN_ for opening.
